com.netflix.genie.web.aspect

Class HealthCheckMetricsAspect

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.genie.web.aspect.HealthCheckMetricsAspect

  • public class HealthCheckMetricsAspect
extends java.lang.Object
    Aspect woven into Spring Boot 'Health' machinery to publish metrics such as time taken, errors and other signals useful for dashboards and alerting.
    Since:
    3.2.4

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HealthCheckMetricsAspect(io.micrometer.core.instrument.MeterRegistry registry)
      Autowired constructor.

      void abstractHealthAggregatorAggregateDetailsMonitor(org.aspectj.lang.JoinPoint joinPoint)
      Intercept calls to the main AbstractHealthAggregator and publish counters for number of invocation and failures, tagged with status and indicator name.
      void abstractHealthIndicatorDoHealthCheckMonitor(org.aspectj.lang.ProceedingJoinPoint joinPoint)
      Intercept call to AbstractHealthIndicator beans loaded and publish a timer tagged with error, if any.

      • abstractHealthIndicatorDoHealthCheckMonitor

        public void abstractHealthIndicatorDoHealthCheckMonitor(org.aspectj.lang.ProceedingJoinPoint joinPoint)
                                                 throws java.lang.Throwable
        Intercept call to AbstractHealthIndicator beans loaded and publish a timer tagged with error, if any. This interception is required because these beans are not captured by HealthIndicator.doHealthCheck(), even tho they implement that interface.
        Parameters:
        joinPoint - joinPoint for the actual call to doHealthCheck()
        Throws:
        java.lang.Throwable - as thrown by joinPoint.proceed()

      • abstractHealthAggregatorAggregateDetailsMonitor

        public void abstractHealthAggregatorAggregateDetailsMonitor(org.aspectj.lang.JoinPoint joinPoint)
        Intercept calls to the main AbstractHealthAggregator and publish counters for number of invocation and failures, tagged with status and indicator name.
        Parameters:
        joinPoint - joinPoint for the aggregateDetails() call
